detaileddescription.para: Macro used to define the SPI Baudrate
Macro used to define the data transfer timeout

briefdescription.para: This API Deinitialize the SPI interface driver Once this called, from there-on user needs to call ExtensionSpiExample_Initialize for using the SPI communication again.
This API initialize the SPI Interface Driver.
This API Read the value from the SPI interface driver.
This API is used to demonstrate read and write on the extension port SPI interface.
This API Write the Value to the SPI interface driver.
function to De-Initialize the Extension Port SPI CS pin.
function to Initialize the Extension Port SPI CS pin with the configurations.
function to Put the Extension board SPI CS pin High
function to Put the Extension board SPI CS pin Low
